title: Software Analyst
description: Brought Black Horizon from prototype to product. Black Horizon is a training simulator for satellite operations an orbital mechanics, deployed in classrooms for the US Space & Air Forces.
details: Served as Tech Lead, contributing to team expansion from 2 to 10+ developers and mentoring new members on coding best practices, system architecture, and design principles.
Reduced content generation time from 30 days to 3 days, utilizing advanced C# features like Attributes, Reflection, and Anonymous Functions.
Developed a specialized physics engine API, reducing code base size by 30% and enabling automatic unit testing
Designed several modular software systems, consistently delivering on time and under budget, securing multiple contract renewals totaling over 5 million dollars from the US government.
Trained for and maintained a Secret level security clearance.
